ygData.subject: Re: Starting a paladin
ygData.msgSnippet: Half Elf gives you a good location, and beat out humans with Infra Vision. Erudites look awesome all armored up. Humans are beat. Dwarves are great
ygData.messageBody:
Half Elf gives you a good location, and beat out humans with Infra Vision.
Erudites look awesome all armored up.
Humans are beat.
Dwarves are great statistically.
High Elves are good on the magic end.

Thos are the ones I would pick through, I forgot who else can be a Paladin..
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Dragon [SMTP:dracon@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, June 08, 1999 8:13 AM
> To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqpaladin] Starting a paladin
>
> From: Dragon <dracon@...>
>
> Hi, I will like to start a paladin and will like to know which race
> is the best for paladin. Thanks in advance.
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Give back to your community through "Grow to Give."
> http://www.onelist.com
> Deadline is June 19. See homepage for details.
